description.ar: تقع شقق كانال فرونت ريزيدنسز على قناة دبي المائية، على بعد دقائق فقط من البحر، وسيتم تشطيبها بأعلى المعايير.
description.en: Conceived by His Highness Sheikh Mohammed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum, UAE Vice President, Prime Minister, and Ruler of Dubai, Meydan has evolved beyond a world-class horseracing venue into an integrated city in the heart of Dubai.Meydan offers an exceptional residential experience, featuring a diverse range of villas, townhouses and apartments designed with elegance and comfort in mind. These homes are nestled among lush green parks, retail outlets and amenities, creating a harmonious environment for residents and visitors alike.

area.en: Al Safa, Dubai Water Canal, Jumeirah district (sub-community of Al Wasl)

location.ar: The community emphasises sustainability and an environmentally friendly lifestyle. Pedestrian-friendly walkways, cycling trails, children's play areas and outdoor fitness centres promote a healthy and active way of life. Additional amenities such as picnic areas, yoga platforms, clubhouses and mosques foster a strong sense of community and wellbeing.
location.en: The community emphasises sustainability and an environmentally friendly lifestyle. Pedestrian-friendly walkways, cycling trails, children's play areas and outdoor fitness centres promote a healthy and active way of life. Additional amenities such as picnic areas, yoga platforms, clubhouses and mosques foster a strong sense of community and wellbeing.

mapDescription.en: Waterfront residences along the Dubai Water Canal, next to Safa Park. Offers easy access to Downtown Dubai, Dubai Mall, Jumeirah Beach, and metro station.

summary.en: Meydan offers premium living experience with exceptional amenities and strategic location in Al Safa, Dubai Water Canal, Jumeirah district (sub-community of Al Wasl).
summary.ar: تقدم كانال فرونت ريزيدنسز تجربة معيشية راقية مع وسائل راحة استثنائية وموقع استراتيجي في .

en.title: Meydan: Premium Living Experience

ar.title: كانال فرونت ريزيدنسز: تجربة معيشية راقية
ar.subtitle: مساكن فاخرة مع وسائل راحة استثنائية في

insights.en: Meydan represents a premium investment opportunity in Dubai, offering luxury living with strong potential for capital appreciation and rental returns in the strategic Al Safa, Dubai Water Canal, Jumeirah district (sub-community of Al Wasl) location.
insights.ar: تمثل كانال فرونت ريزيدنسز فرصة استثمارية متميزة في دبي، حيث تقدم عيشًا فاخرًا مع إمكانات قوية لتقدير رأس المال والعوائد الإيجارية في الموقع الاستراتيجي في .
